mean_cn: n.垄断；垄断商品；专卖商品
mean_en: the complete control of trade in particular goods or the supply of a particular service; a type of goods or a service that is controlled in this way
sentence: The biggest company has a monopoly in the market!
sentence_trans: 最大的那家公司垄断了市场！
word_etyma: mono单个，一个 + poly工艺学校 → 独家卖 → monopoly垄断
